submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        N = len(nums)
        mp = {}
        c = Counter()
        for i in range(N//2):
            c[abs(nums[i] - nums[N-i-1])]+=1
            mp[i] = max(abs(k-nums[i]),abs(nums[i]),abs(k-nums[N-i-1]),abs(nums[N-i-1]))
        if max(c.values())==N//2:
            return 0
        nmp = list(mp.values())  
        nmp.sort()
        mi = 10**20
        for x in range(2*k + 1):
            here = 0
            idx = bisect_left(nmp,x)
            u = len(nmp) - idx
            here = 2*idx +  u - c[x]
            # print(x,here)
            mi = min(here,mi)
        return mi
